name: event_id
description: Unique identifier for the specific event instance

name: user_id
description: Unique identifier for the user performing the action

name: timestamp
description: Unix timestamp of when the event occurred

name: event_type
description: The type of interaction (e.g., view_product, add_to_cart, purchase)

name: product_id
description: Unique identifier for the product involved in the event

name: revenue
description: Total revenue generated if the event is a purchase

name: ip_address
description: The IP address of the user's device

name: city
description: The city location derived from the user's IP

name: state
description: The state or region derived from the user's IP

name: country
description: The country location derived from the user's IP

name: transaction_id
description: Unique identifier for the financial transaction (purchase only)
